author: joeyaiello
body:
Just wanted to track the fact that I'm doing a slight refactoring of `CONTRIBUTING.md` in order to understand which documents might be unnecessary. For example, a couple of the empty docs in `docs/dev-process` have already been fully documented in `docs/building`. 

Doing work in `joey/docs-refactor`

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @joeyaiello you need to rebase, I changed a lot of things in #1305

title: Eliminate unnecessary stub documents
